actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The frog can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap
special_abilities.desc: The frog's long jump is up to 10 feet and its high jump is up to 5 feet, with or without a running start.
